name: Arcade Space Shooter (Kathlar)
description:
ARCADE SPACE SHOOTER by Black Hole Outcasts

Star Wars meets Hades. Arcade Space Shooter is isometric, roguelike, fast paced action RPG space shooter with local coop.

Grab up to 3 friends, choose spaceships, shoot enemies and collect rewards. Fight, die, fight again.

The game is currently in prototype stage. Current version 0.1.1.
